Interface OperationFunctions

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface OperationFunctions
OperationFunctions Interface
This interface contains all the methods for the operation of the program

    • newPerson

      static Person newPerson​(Scanner sc, String personRole)
      newPerson Method.
      The method creates a new object from the Person class
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner object to allow user input
      personRole - String to indicate the person type (Architect, Contractor or Customer)
      Returns:
      returns a Person object of the specified role
      Since:
      version 1.00

    • newProject

      static void newProject​(Company company, Scanner sc)
      newProject Method.
      The method creates a new object from the Project class and stores it in the Company class
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner object to allow user input
      company - Company object which the project are stored in *
      Since:

    • displayPersonGroup

      static void displayPersonGroup​(ArrayList<Person> group, String groupName)
      dispayPersonGroup Method.
      The method displays the list of all people in a person type group
      Parameters:
      group - Arraylist of the person type (architects or contractors)
      groupName - String indicating group type, for the print outs mentioning the group
      Since:
      version 1.00

    • saveProgram

      static void saveProgram​(Company company)
      saveProgram Method.
      The method saves the company class containing all the projects and people to a .txt file
      Parameters:
      company - Company class object containing the stored projects and people
      Since:
      version 1.00

    • openProgram
